channel.description:
hi... when i try to run 508+ i get this
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/Skjermdump-5.png[/img]
it only stops there and won't move... got any idea on how to fix?

item.dc:creator: @Dubstep Dubstep
item.description:
@Dubstep wrote:

emtec:

run server befor u start client use the ip 127.0.0.1 make sure u use the right client for the right source.

he already said that hes using the client made for his server source :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @emtec emtec
item.description:
@emtec wrote:

run server befor u start client use the ip 127.0.0.1 make sure u use the right client for the right source.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“kneistol, post:3, topic:360067”][quote author=Dubstep link=topic=456506.msg3341284#msg3341284 date=1284390701]
that means it isnt connecting to your update server. that can happen for a number of reasons:

your ip isnt entered correctly so the client isnt connecting to the server files
your server files are incorrect or corrupt
your trying to connect to your server with the wrong client

[/quote]

  1. my ip is set to 127.0.0.1
  2. my files are great since i just downloaded mezzyscape 508 and this happens to all my 508+ games
  3. its same source and client so i don’t think thats the problem[/quote]

pm me ur teamveiw id + pass

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Dubstep Dubstep
item.description:
@Dubstep wrote:

are you saving all of the server files in your C drive?

Read full topic

item.description:

make sure you are actually running the server
